plot: David Hilton is a mythological research expert. When his friend, Dr Kixley, is kidnapped by dangerous Satanists, David is called on by the Vatican to help save Dr Kixley from an evil end.
title: Idol of Evil
plot_es: David Hilton is a mythological research expert. When his friend, Dr Kixley, is kidnapped by dangerous Satanists, David is called on by the Vatican to help save Dr Kixley from an evil end.
plot_en: David Hilton is a mythological research expert. When his friend, Dr Kixley, is kidnapped by dangerous Satanists, David is called on by the Vatican to help save Dr Kixley from an evil end.
